title: I LOVE MY BROTHER ENKI
description: A tale of climbing mountains to escape drugs, gods, and ghosts.A tale of conversing with the Elder Race while trying to escape yourself, completely giving up on Life and Love. A tale of the Dark Path that leads to the Light inside, ISHTAR, and THE ALL. A tale where obtaining the Keys to the Gates of Consciousness occurs unknowingly, after ayahuasca, meditation, and fasting, while seeking to find The Balance.
author: KN LN
